page.title: 14THE OWNER OF GURNARD STORES.
page.content: Mr Dow has lived in Gurnard for 52 years.He is very well known for his shop.And he has lived in the village stores for a very long time.Before Mr Dow owned the shop his father kept it.Mr Dow enjoys being a shop keeper because he likes people and everyone likes him.He works about 76 hours in the shop each week.The thing is,he is so busy he doesn't get proper meals. Nor does Mr Dow get any holidays either.He has liked football ever since he was a boy.He teaches children from Gurnard school how to play football.He keeps chickens too,and has kept them since he was a boy.When he was 18 he joined the R.A.F.and after that he worked in his father's shop and helped milk the cows on Mr.Smith's farm then in the evenings he worked at the Woodvale Hotel behind the bar.
